post.author: DoomzRules
post.body:
Hello, yes I know I was the guy who asked for a remake of DOOM 1 and 2 on DOOM 3 engine which I now realize is impossible given the time it would take. Also, umm... I just have one simple request.... could someone here make the DOOM 3 Alpha Shotgun and then put on DOOM 3 Filefront. It's just I feel (and I'm pretty sure a lot of OTHER people) are disappointed with the new DOOM 3 final shotgun. The one in the Alpha resembled the DOOM 1 shotgun a lot more and it looked a LOT more cooler. So umm... yeah I didn't mean to disturb anyone in this awesome DOOM community. But umm yeah.


Also, you don't HAVE to do it. But if you want to, that's fine because I think 50% of the DOOM 3 community would want DOOM 3 Alpha Shotgun. Well, I'm not EXACTLY sure... so IDK honestly. But if I offended anybody by saying 50%... please forgive me! :3

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
Unfortunately, your request is unlikely to be fulfilled. It was actually requested before, but still isn't done.

What you ask involves finding differences between alpha model format and Doom3 release model format, then changing the alpha's shotgun model so that Doom3 release could read it.

So your best bet is to try and make it yourself or, alternatively, maybe have a look at Phobos mod's shotgun? Who knows, maybe you'll like it and just wait for Phobos mod instead.
